subject: Awards, Decorations and Honors
Testosterone
Baseball
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: A little over a month after news broke that Ryan Braun had a positive drug test, he will receive the National League Most Valuable Player award at a dinner Saturday in Manhattan.
snippet: A little over a month after news broke that Ryan Braun had a positive drug test, he will receive the National League Most Valuable Player award at a dinner Saturday in Manhattan.
